body: If the ranger selects natural weapon style, he can choose from the following list whenever he gains a combat style feat: Aspect of the Beast, Improved Natural Weapon, Rending Claws, and Weapon Focus. At 6th level, he adds Eldritch Fangs and Vital Strike to the list. At 10th level, he adds Multiattack and Improved Vital Strike to the list.
name: Natural Weapon
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Ranger/New Combat Styles/Natural Weapon
